messages.title: Let's get Britain on the road to recovery
messages.content: Our economy is in a fragile state. Labour's failed economic policies have put many people out of work and have left millions struggling to get by.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Immediate action to get banks lending to small businesses to help create jobs. The pledge to move to equity investment and mutuals to prevent bank abuses and to start building a strong economy again.
A fairer tax plan that will put money back in the pockets of ordinary families.

mentions.tacticalSituation: In many areas the choice is between the Liberal Democrats and Labour. The Conservatives are out of the running and can’t win in many parts of Britain.

issues.economy: Our economy is in a fragile state. Labour's failed economic policies have put many people out of work and have left millions struggling to get by.

leaflet.personalStatement: As Chancellor of the Exchequer, I would immediately get the banks lending to small businesses to help create jobs. We will break the banks to ensure that people’s savings are never put at risk again.

politicalExperience.role: Shadow Chancellor of the Exchequer for the Liberal Democrats

leaflet.additionalNotes: PS - The Conservatives can’t win in many areas of Britain. For real change, fairer taxes and a strong economy, make sure you back the Liberal Democrats on election day.
